text: velekad ehaze-llahu misaka beni israil. vebe`asna minhumu-sney `asera nekiba. vekale-llahu inni me`akum. lein ekamtumu-ssalate veateytumu-zzekate veamentum birusuli ve`azzertumuhum veakradtumu-llahe kardan hasenel leukeffiranne `ankum seyyiatikum veleudhilennekum cennatin tecri min tahtihe-l'enhar. femen kefera ba`de zalike minkum fekad dalle sevae-ssebil
